name: SIMPLY ICE CREAM LTD
address: The Nook, Boat Lane, Bonnington, Ashford, Kent, TN25 7BA
description: Simply Ice Cream produce luxury ice creams and sorbets in a variety of over 30 flavours using only the finest ingredients without any 'nasties'.  We supply a number of outlets across the South East with a number in Ashford. During this period, for those self isolating, we are also offering home delivery - minimum quantity of 6 x 500ml pots. Order by email or telephone with card payments. Delivery & Collection.
